page.title: 04Four Lanes Clubs for Youth.
page.content: In Four Lanes village there is a youth club in the church hall.The age group is 8/12.It meets on a Friday night. There is a senior youth club which meets on a Thursday night.On a Friday we play snooker,pool and darts. On sale there are fizzy drinks, sweets and crisps.In the village we have a football club the age range is 8 to 13, we practice on Thursday at quarter to seven and go home at 9 o'clock. We learn ball skills and controlling the ball. We play five-a-side matches as well as eleven-a-side matches in a local league.
